alert.note: Alert for Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 2:52PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Gilchrist, western Alachua, southwestern Columbia and southeastern Suwannee Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 251 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ichetucknee Spring to near Williston. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ichetucknee Spring, Columbia, High Springs, Archer, Fort White, Newberry and Hildreth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Western Alachua
